'''Radiant Spincrystal 76''' is an item used in the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] or [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]] to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] [[Vestige of Dahri]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on the arm of the Ruin Golem in [[Devantaka Mountain]].
